# Digi Web Crew

> Professional Web Development and Technical SEO Architecture managed by Toqeer Shafique. Specialist in high-performance React ecosystems and GEO (Generative Engine Optimization).

## Core Mission
To deliver technical excellence through scalable, AI-ready web architectures that prioritize performance (LCP < 1.2s), semantic precision, and cross-platform visibility.

## Core Specializations & Authority Pillars

- **Enterprise AI Chatbot Integration**: Multi-modal orchestration, RAG architectures, and secure isolated VPC hosting.
- **Next.js & MERN (Dubai DIFC/Fintech)**: High-performance, NESA-compliant web systems for Gulf-based startups.
- **AI-Powered CMS (WordPress/Shopify)**: Autonomous content pipelines, predictive e-commerce, and custom Shopify Functions.
- **AEO/GEO/SEO Strategy**: Dominating the "Citation Economy" through technical proof and advanced JSON-LD.
- **Generative UI & AI-Adaptive Design**: Building millisecond-precision interfaces using AI-synthesis workflows.

## Technical Proof & Verification Hubs
- **Software Lab**: Live engineering prototypes (Latency benchmarks, AEO targets).
- **GitHub (toqeer74)**: Open-source fragments and architecture patterns.
- **Freelance Proof**: Multi-platform authority on Upwork and Fiverr.

## Technical Stack
- **Languages**: TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
- **Frameworks**: Next.js, React, Node.js
- **Infrastructure**: Vercel, MongoDB, Google Cloud
- **Tracking**: GTM, GA4, Meta CAPI, LinkedIn Insight

## Key Technical Benchmark
- **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)**: Under 1.2 seconds on Vercel Edge.
- **Deduplication Strategy**: Unique Event IDs for both Browser Pixel and Server CAPI.
- **Privacy Compliance**: Google Consent Mode v2 integrated.
